mapper.select: SELECT ir.f_user_id, ir.f_receive_user_id, ir.f_delete_user_id, bu.F_HEAD_ICON, ir.f_receive_time, ic.f_content_type, ic.f_content, ic.f_delete_user_id, ic.f_del_flag FROM base_im_reply ir LEFT JOIN sys_user bu ON ir.f_user_id = bu.F_Id LEFT JOIN base_im_content ic ON ic.f_send_user_id = bu.F_Id AND ir.f_user_id = ic.f_send_user_id AND ir.f_receive_user_id = ic.f_receive_user_id AND ir.f_receive_time = ic.f_send_time AND (ir.f_del_flag != 1 OR ir.f_del_flag IS NULL)
